prob_inference¶

synopsis:Module for probabilistic inference on a formula_gen.PBModel.
class prob_inference.PBInference(pb_model)[source]¶

Container of inference methods for a formula_gen.PBModel.

backward_plates()[source]¶

Compute backward probabilities for all plates.

Return type:list of els. returned by prob_inference_dev.backward_plate_cy()
gibbs_sampler_plates(n, burn_in, lag, track_ll, in_file, metric, algo)[source]¶

Gibbs sampling. Updates x and theta, creates a theta_avg attribute and optionally saves metric to an output file.

Parameters:
  • n (see ‘-n’ in Command line options) –
  • burn_in (see ‘-b’ in Command line options) –
  • lag (see ‘-l’ in Command line options) –
  • track_ll (see ‘-t’ in Command line options) –
  • in_file (see ‘in_file’ in Command line options) –
  • metric (see ‘-m’ in Command line options) –
  • algo (see ‘-a’ in Command line options) –
Return type:

None
reset_x()[source]¶

Reset counts in x. Updates x.

Return type:None
sample_bdd_plates()[source]¶

Sample x method. Calls backward_plates() and for each plate prob_inference_dev.sample_bdd_plate_cy(). Updates x.

Return type:None
sample_theta()[source]¶

Main method for sampling theta. Updates theta. Also updates parameters of propositional variables in BDDs.

Return type:None
